Di Depan Bankir, Jokowi Minta Bunga Kredit Turun!
06 Nov 2019, 06:48 by Rengga Sancaya
 Jakarta - Presiden Jokowi meminta perbankan nasional untuk serius menurunkan suku bunga kredit. Hal itu disampaikan dalam acara Indonesia Banking Expo 2019.



Jokowi membuka Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 di Hotel Fairmont, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019). 



Jokowi meminta perbankan nasional untuk serius menurunkan suku bunga kredit. Pasalnya, bunga acuan Bank Indonesia (BI) sudah berkali-kali turun. 



Jokowi bilang, perbankan di negara lain sudah banyak yang menurunkan suku bunga kredit perbankannya. Hal itu sebagai tindak lanjut bank sentral negara lain yang menurunkan suku bunga acuannya. 



Menurut Jokowi, bank sentral juga sudah beberapa kali menurunkan suku bunga acuan BI 7 days reverse repo rate sebanyak 100 basis poin (bps) menjadi 5%. 



Jokowi juga menyampaikan pidato soal pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia. Ia mengaku bangga atas pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia yang tetap konsisten di level 5%. 



Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 yang dibuka Jokowi ini bertema Consolidate to Elevate. 



Menteri Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto juga hadir dalam pembukaan Indonesia Banking Expo 2019. 



Jokowi sempat menyapa peserta Indonesia Banking Expo 2019.

In Front of the Banker, Jokowi Asks for Loan Interest to Go Down!
Nov 6, 2019, 06:48 by Rengga Sancaya
Jakarta - President Jokowi called on national banks to seriously reduce lending rates. This was stated at the Indonesia Banking Expo 2019.



Jokowi opened the 2019 Indonesia Banking Expo at the Fairmont Hotel, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).



Jokowi asked national banks to seriously reduce lending rates. Because the benchmark interest rate of Bank Indonesia (BI) has repeatedly dropped.



Jokowi said that banks in other countries had lowered their bank loan interest rates. This was a follow-up to the central banks of other countries which lowered their benchmark interest rates.



According to Jokowi, the central bank has also several times reduced the benchmark BI rate by 7 days reverse repo rate by 100 basis points (bps) to 5%.



Jokowi also delivered a speech about Indonesia's economic growth. He claimed to be proud of Indonesia's economic growth which remained consistent at the 5% level.



The Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 which was opened by Jokowi has the theme Consolidate to Elevate.



The Coordinating Minister for the Economy Airlangga Hartarto was also present at the opening of the 2019 Indonesia Banking Expo.



Jokowi greeted the participants of the Indonesia Banking Expo 2019.
